Organization Name: HOPE WOMENS SHELTER | WOMENS SHELTER | DOMESTIC ABUSE SERVICES
Description: Provides a safe haven for women, men, children, and families in situations of domestic abuse. Services provided include counseling for violence and sexual abuse in an individual session or in peer support groups, legal advocacy, resource assistance, transportation to medical resource assistance programs, food, clothing and case management. Anyone in a domestic violence situation may access services - shelter residency is not required.

Organization Name: JOHNSON COUNTY FAMILY CRISIS CENTER | CRISIS CENTER | DOMESTIC VIOLENCE AND SEXUAL ASSAULT SERVICES
Description: Provides shelter, counseling and support groups for primary and secondary victims of family violence and/or sexual assault.

Organization Name: WISE HOPE SHELTER AND CRISIS CENTER | JACK COUNTY SITE | OUTREACH CENTER
Description: Provide a shelter, 24-hour hotline, and accompaniment services to survivors of domestic or sexual assault.

Organization Name: WISE HOPE SHELTER AND CRISIS CENTER | MONTAGUE COUNTY SITE | OUTREACH CENTER
Description: Provide a shelter, 24-hour hotline, and accompaniment services to survivors of domestic or sexual assault.

Organization Name: WISE HOPE SHELTER AND CRISIS CENTER | WISE COUNTY SITE | OUTREACH CENTER
Description: Provide a shelter, 24-hour hotline, and accompaniment services to survivors of domestic or sexual assault.

Organization Name: SAFEHAVEN OF TARRANT COUNTY | ARLINGTON SHELTER | EMERGENCY SHELTER
Description: Provides emergency shelter for victims for victims of domestic violence. Secondary services offered supportive housing, children counseling, prevention training and other supportive services for shelter residents.Any persons that connects with a shelter/partnering agency is entered into a shared information system that is managed by the Housing Related Coordinated Entry Lead Agency, and there are multiple access points. NOTE: This agency is can refer individuals to an access point based on eligibility.

Organization Name: FAMILY COMMUNITY CASE MANAGEMENT | FAMILY COMMUNITY CASE MANAGEMENT | WOMENS DOMESTIC VIOLENCE SHELTER
Description: Provides a shelter for women who have experienced domestic violence or sex trafficking.. Also provides supportive services such as counseling, peer- support, case management, and life coaching. Shelter location disclosed after screening and acceptance into the program.*** All clients admitted to the shelter are required to meet with a case manager.

Organization Name: CENTER FOR TRANSFORMING LIVES | MAIN OFFICE | EMERGENCY SHELTER
Description: Provides on-site emergency homeless shelter for homeless women 18 years of age and older with up to 2 children ages 0 to 3 years old. Offers up to 90 day stay. Determines Intake during office hours on a case by case basis. **Any persons that connects with a shelter/partnering agency is entered into a shared information system that is managed by the Housing Related Coordinated Entry Lead Agency, and there are multiple access points. NOTE: This agency is an access point.

Organization Name: MISSION GRANBURY | RESOURCE CENTER | NON-RESIDENTIAL VICTIM'S SERVICES
Description: Provides assessment and assistance to individuals and families who are victims of crime, including sexual assault and family violence. Provides a 24 hour crisis intervention hotline; advocacy, safe shelter, and counseling for women and children who are victims of domestic violence.
